article_title: Brussels Airport Company NV/SA -- Moody's affirms Brussels Airport's Baa1 ratings, outlook remains negative
article_text: Moody's Investors Service, ("Moody's") today affirmed Brussels Airport Company NV/SA ("BAC")'s Baa1 senior secured rating and the (P)Baa1 long-term senior secured rating for the company's Euro Medium Term Note programme. A full list of affected ratings is provided towards the end of this press release. The affirmation of BAC's ratings reflects Moody's expectations that a gradual recovery in passenger traffic together with the company's cost cutting efforts will support a return to credit metrics commensurate with a Baa1 rating by 2022.
